segments.text: Tell me about your brother and sister , Sue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , my sister is a lawyer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Does she live here in Seattle ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , she does . But she's working in Washington , D . C . , right now . Her job is top secret .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! ! And what does your brother do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's a painter . He's working in Argentina this month . He has an exhibition there .
segments.speaker: S2
